entry.string: Please enter a name for the new site
Please enter a unique Table Prefix for this site.
Sorry, a site with domain name #(1) already exists. Please use a different site (sub)domain name
Sorry, a subsite already exists in database #(1) with database prefix #(2) Please use a different table prefix.
Unable to set configuration vars for #(1) Check your database and tables exist and try again.
The subsite folder #(1)/#(2) already exists!\nRemove this subsite and recreate, or edit the exising subsite.
The subsite directory #(1)/#(2) was not created!
The subsite var directory #(1)/#(2)/var was not created!
